topic.title: Allow all valid filenames to be added to content.json
topic.body:
Fix #2136 by allowing all valid filenames to be added to content.json when a site is published.

I basically used the new regex expressions that the creator of the issue suggested, modified to allow files in subdirectories to also be added to content.json.

1604067437_mirrored_joshiemoore_github.body: I replaced the hex version with the non-hex version (modified for syntax and functionality), could you clarify what you mean by a "test os"?
I'm not sure if this is the sort of thing you're looking for, I'm not that experienced in writing tests for projects like this.
@HelloZeroNet I was wondering if there is any further action required on this PR, as it's been a few months since it was last updated.
